channel.title: I need an album cover
channel.description:
I know there's a lot of talent here at this forum and I also know that this isn't a hard project for those who know what they're doing.
[img]http://distilleryimage11.s3.amazonaws.com/51c8cdaa7b9611e1be6a12313820455d_6.jpg[/img] [img]http://distilleryimage7.s3.amazonaws.com/d3de0d1a745111e1989612313815112c_6.jpg[/img] [img]http://distilleryimage9.s3.amazonaws.com/cd63264c695611e1a87612313804ec91_6.jpg[/img] [img]http://distilleryimage0.s3.amazonaws.com/19fe0d124bbd11e1abb01231381b65e3_6.jpg[/img]
Here's four pictures I've taken. I can't quite decide which one I want yet, so I'll leave it up to the artist.
I simply want the EP title and my alias wherever you see fit (corner, center, etc.) and if it's necessary blow the image up to 500x500 (I think that's the standard for album artwork at least.)
Artist alias: Voxiflex EP title: Thanks, for the Beginning
Image files are attached.

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:


I rarely use Photoshop for anything… but this’ll be my attempt…

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

I suck @ Photoshop but it kept me entertained for 10 minutes. PSD if you want it.

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

god damn it i lost the psd

anyway i’ll try a new design possible. i did the blurring to make it blend in. I believe that the picture should be sharp in the background to use sharp text and layers, but since it doesn’t, it looked meh when I tried regular text.

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“c|p, post:6, topic:438624”]This isn’t Reaper’s opinion, but:

TabbyKiller - needs less diagonal lines.
DEFET - text not visible enough.

Anyway, I’m not very good with Photoshop myself, but if I have enough time at work I might have a go.[/quote]I would really appreciate it if you could get something for me, so however long it takes.

[quote=“DEFET, post:5, topic:438624”]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/3927/25362446.png
http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/9675/ep2w.png[/quote]
Both of these I like. I like the one with the seat the most though, and I think what c|p was trying to say was the text is literally a bit blurry, not “not visible”. If you could sharpen the word THANKS and maybe put voxiflex above the seat that would be cool.

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

The Reaper X:

Thanks Tabby, but could you make it a little more subtle? vini vidi vici if you know what I’m sayin. It’s a chill electronic genre if that helps.

The Reaper X:

but could you make it a little more subtle? vini vidi vici if you know what I’m sayin.

The Reaper X:

make it a little more subtle? vini vidi vici

The Reaper X:

more subtle?

all depends on the style. i could of made it flashy, pop out, w.e, but you have to follow the guidelines.

Read full topic

item.title: I need an album cover
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

This isn’t Reaper’s opinion, but:

TabbyKiller - needs less diagonal lines.
DEFET - text not visible enough.

Anyway, I’m not very good with Photoshop myself, but if I have enough time at work I might have a go.

Read full topic
